comments:
Installing the latest build of Aperi-incubation-R04-071114-220126.zip on Linux platform; tried to login report viewing - it failed with authentication error.

The Linux system - Red Hat AS release 3
The browser - SeaMonkey 1.0.7 ( Mozilla/5.0 )

Looks like a classpath or ldlibrary path problem:
WARNING: AUTH FAILURE: user root
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: isValidUser
        at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.Roles.isValidUser(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.Roles.validateLocalLogin(Roles.java:647)
        at org.eclipse.aperi.jaas.spi.OSLoginModule.login(OSLoginModule.java:166)

My data agent didn't come up either due to another Unsatisfied link error
Checked in a new version of reporting.sh that sets LD_LIBRARY_PATH correctly (same as in agent.sh).
